title: 2 bedroom, State-of-the-art fitness center, Gas log fireplace
posting_body: Verona Apartments offers the utmost in Henderson living with one, two, and three bedroom apartments.
You will enjoy the renovated redesigned interiors and life-enhancing upgrades around the property.
Wood-style plank flooring, spacious floor plans, and in-home laundry options are just a few apartment features you'll love.
Poolside green space with recreational games
Terrace featuring outdoor seating and barbecue pavilion                                                                                         Featured amenity
Virtual moving concierge – Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements
Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity
Breakfast bar and built-in wine rack
Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas
